Trustee_19_pre_3.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated a commitment to fairness and trust by proposing a generous allocation plan prioritizing Sofia's interests, ensuring they received the majority of the profits. My transparent communication regarding the investment outcome and profit distribution has further solidified my reputation as a trustworthy trustee. I have successfully fostered a collaborative relationship based on mutual respect and transparency, reflecting my focus on upholding equitable practices in investment exchanges.
